# excludeSimpleHostnames

**Instance Property**

A Boolean indicating if HTTP requests using single-label host names should be excluded from using the proxy settings.

## Declaration

```swift
var excludeSimpleHostnames: Bool { get set }
```

## Accessing General Proxy Properties

- **exceptionList**: An array of domain name patterns. If the destination host name of an HTTP connection matches one of these patterns then the proxy settings will not be used for the connection.
- **matchDomains**: An array of domain strings.
